questions.question: 1.      What were Hog Man and his Swine Gang robbing of from supermarkets?

choices.answer: Fresh fruit and vegetables to sell them in the black market.
All their fresh fruit and vegetables and money.
All their grocery and vegetables to sell them in the black market.

questions.question: What does the word health-nut mean on page 54?
What did the Emerald Flash look like?

choices.answer: She wore a white mask and bodysuit with purple gloves and boots.
She wore a green mask and bodysuit with purple gloves and boots.
She wore a purple mask and bodysuit with orange gloves and boots.
She wore a blue mask and bodysuit with purple gloves and boots.
In the backyard of Aaron’s house.
